hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Aishah:That the Messenger of Allah designated Dhul-Hulaifah as the Miqat for the people of Al-Madinah, Al-Juhfah for the people of Ash-sham and Eguypt, Dhat 'Irq fro the people of al-Iraq, and Yalamlam for the people of Yemen

chapter.eng-name: The Miqat Of The People Of Egypt
